info.title: It's A Wrap POS API
info.description: API for It's A Wrap POS system - supports Flutter mobile apps and web applications

post.description: Login with username and password to receive a Bearer token
Revoke the current access token

get.description: Returns the currently authenticated user
Get all branches with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new branch

get.description: Get a single branch with its items

post.description: Sync items available at this branch

get.description: Get all cash sessions with optional filtering

post.description: Open a new cash session for the current user

get.description: Get a single cash session with details

post.description: Close an open cash session

patch.description: Update running totals for an open cash session

get.description: Get the currently open cash session for the authenticated user

200.description: Current session (or null if none open)

get.description: Get all categories ordered by sort_order

post.description: Create a new category

get.description: Get a single category with its items
Get all customers with optional search

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, phone, or email

post.description: Create a new customer

get.description: Get a single customer with their orders
Get all items with optional filtering by category and active status

post.description: Create a new menu item

get.description: Get a single item with its relationships

post.description: Replace all item options for an item in a single batch operation. Deletes existing options and creates new ones. Dependencies are scoped per parent ItemOptionValue; each dependency creates a dependent ItemOption linked to that parent value.

dependency.description: Nested dependency for this parent value. API creates a dependent ItemOption per parent value and an OptionDependency link.

child_option_id.description: The Option ID to use for the dependent ItemOption

price.description: Override price for the dependent ItemOptionValue

get.description: Get all item options, optionally filtered by item

post.description: Create a new item option

get.description: Get a single item option with its values
Get all item option values, optionally filtered by item option

post.description: Create a new item option value

get.description: Get a single item option value

put.description: Update an existing item option value

get.description: Get all options with their values

post.description: Create a new option with values

get.description: Get a single option with its values
Get all option dependencies, optionally filtered by parent or child

post.description: Create a dependency between a parent ItemOptionValue and a child ItemOption

get.description: Get a single option dependency with relationships
Get all option values, optionally filtered by option

post.description: Create a new option value

get.description: Get a single option value
Get all orders with optional filtering

parameters.name: status_ids
parameters.description: Filter by multiple statuses (comma-separated or array)

post.description: Create a new order with items

get.description: Get a single order with all details
Get all order items with optional filtering by order

post.description: Add a new item to an existing order

get.description: Get a single order item with its options

put.description: Update an order item's quantity or price

delete.description: Remove an item from an order

get.description: Get all payments with optional filtering

post.description: Record a new payment for an order

get.description: Get a single payment with its order
Get all application settings
Get a single setting by key

put.description: Update a setting value by key

post.description: Update multiple settings at once

get.description: Get all order statuses

post.description: Create a new order status

get.description: Get a single status
Get all tax configurations

post.description: Create a new tax configuration

get.description: Get a single tax with its items
Get all tips with optional filtering

post.description: Record a new tip for an order

get.description: Get a single tip with its order
Check if a username is already used, with optional exclude_id
Check if an email is already used, with optional exclude_id
Get all withdrawals with optional filtering

post.description: Record a new withdrawal from the current cash session

422.description: No open session or validation error

get.description: Get a single withdrawal with details

delete.description: Delete a withdrawal and adjust session totals
